Class PlacedTileFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.tiles.PlacedTileFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientComponentVisitor
public class PlacedTileFactory extends Object implements ClientComponentVisitor
Implementation of ClientComponentVisitor, creates a PlacedTile that represents the given ClientComponent.

  • Method Details

    • createTile

      public PlacedTile createTile(ShipCoords center, ClientComponent component)
      Returns the corresponding PlacedTile from the given Client Component.
      Parameters:
      center - ShipCoords Coordinates used to create ServerMessage triggered by Drag and Drop events.
      component - ClientComponent Component to convert.
      Returns:
      PlacedTile Produced tile.
